title: Full Stack Web Development Certification
description: Master modern web development with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects and get industry-ready skills.

title: Data Science & Machine Learning Certification
description: Learn Python, pandas, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow. Build ML models and analyze data like a pro.

title: Digital Marketing Mastery Certification
description: Complete digital marketing course covering SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, and analytics.

title: Cloud Computing with AWS Certification
description: Master Amazon Web Services, deploy scalable applications, and prepare for AWS certification exams.

title: Mobile App Development Certification
description: Build iOS and Android apps using React Native. Learn mobile UI/UX design and app store deployment.

title: Cybersecurity Fundamentals Certification
description: Learn ethical hacking, network security, cryptography, and incident response. Protect digital assets effectively.
